Devices.NotFoundDeviceByIdentifierErrorMessage: Cannot resolve the specified connected device by the provided index or identifier. To list currently connected devices and verify that the specified index or identifier exists, run '%s device'.
Devices.NotFoundDeviceByIdentifierErrorMessageWi: Could not find device by specified identifier '%s'. To list currently connected devices and verify that the specified identifier exists, run '%s device'.
Devices.NotFoundDeviceByIndexErrorMessage: Could not find device by specified index %d. To list currently connected devices and verify that the specified index exists, run '%s device'.
